content.question: Using the excerpts, answer a, b, and c. Briefly explain ONE major difference between Wiebe’s and Sklar’s historical interpretations. Briefly explain how ONE example from the period 1880 to 1920 not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Wiebe’s argument. Briefly explain how ONE example from the period 1880 to 1920 not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Sklar’s argument.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
